    the argument <<span class='code'|service>> are displayed~. ~If you want all the sub~-menus to be
    displayed~, specify <<span class='code'|~?whole~_tree~=true>>~. ~If <<span class='code'|service>> is <<span class='code'|~None>>~, the current
    page is used~.\\
